snippet.title: Sea of Thieves: Official E3 2016 Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sea of Thieves E3 2016 Cinematic Trailer, using in-game assets to portray just some of the limitless piratical possibilities on the legendary Sea of Thieves. Coming to Xbox One and Windows 10. Song: "We Shall Sail Together" composed by Robin Beanland and performed by Anna Hon. Visit the official game site at https://www.seaofthieves.com

Follow Sea of Thieves on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeaOfThieves
Like Sea of Thieves on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SeaOfThievesGame

Xbox Live Gold required to play (sold separately).
